title: @Riot KateyKhaos About Taric Chromas
body: Was there any thought to create Chromas on Taric? I really enjoy his classic model, and was really wondering. :O

replies.body: Nope, since he was under a huge rework, we didn't include him in ideations for chromas. Now that his rework is done, it's not out of the question for the future.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=meAXTUt1,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-04-08T19:40:54.781+0000)
>
> Nope, since he was under a huge rework, we didn't include him in ideations for chromas. Now that his rework is done, it's not out of the question for the future.

will we ever even get new chromas?

Potentially - we've been discussing the best way to do chromas, as you've probably seen via surveys (either on Reddit or personally on your client)! We'll be sure to make an announcement if we have updates!

I don't understand why Reddit seems to be taking over communication with the playerbase.  What was the point of the Forum changes if everyone was going to abandon ship for reddit?

I don't like reddit and it feels like there is hardly any contact with Rioters on the actual boards anymore.

To clarify the specific point I was making above - we do run surveys via the client or via an email that you've provided. I was referring to Reddit in terms of finding screenshots of surveys that we've sent out via the methods listed above.

I can't speak to why a Rioter may choose one forum over the other. For me, I tend to stick to the boards for skins content, mostly because we have PBE boards. I do lurk Reddit, but I find a ton of good (constructive) discussion on these boards.
Agreed. Came here to say just that as well. Thanks Khan ;)

Please post surveys and stuff here on the boards. This is your official website. It should be the primary place for feedback. Why should I go to a completely different website to give feedback on a game that already has it's own forum? As an avid boards user, it seems a bit unfair cuz idonlike reddit :P

It's almost the same as, I dunno, having to go to third party websites to learn champion stats and scalings **intense side-eye*..*

To clarify, we do run surveys via the client or via an email that you've provided. I was referring to Reddit in terms of finding screenshots of surveys that we've sent out via the methods listed above. :)

Katey, not to hijack the thread or anything but could you please take a look at this?
I need this more than oxygen
